message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENT_FV_VERIFICATION_REQUIREMENT_CANCELLED
message.locale: This Verification Requirement record has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENT_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: A Verification Requirement Name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENT_XRV_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A Verification Requirement with the name specified already exists. Please enter a new name

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENT_FV_TO_DATE_BEFORE_FROM_DATE
message.locale: The To Date must be equal to or later than the From Date.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENT_FV_WARNING_DAYS_GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO_DUE_DAYS
message.locale: The number specified for warning days must be less than that specified for due days.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENT_FV_DUE_DAYS_EXCEED_VERIFICATION_REQUIREMENT_PERIOD
message.locale: The number of due days must not exceed the period of the verification requirement.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENT_FV_NEGATIVE_MINIMUM_ITEMS
message.locale: The Minimum Items specified must not be less than zero.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENT_FV_NEGATIVE_DUE_DAYS
message.locale: The Due Days specified must not be less than zero days.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENT_FV_NEGATIVE_WARNING_DAYS
message.locale: The Warning Days specified must not be less than zero days.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENT_FV_WARNING_DAYS_WITHOUT_DUE_DAYS
message.locale: Warning Days cannot be specified if there are no Due Days specified.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENT_FV_DUE_DAYS_EVENT_WITHOUT_DUE_DAYS
message.locale: A Due Date Event cannot be specified if there are no Due Days specified.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENT_FV_MODIFY_DUE_DAYS_TRUE_WITHOUT_DUE_DAYS
message.locale: The Modify Due Date indicator cannot be set if there are no Due Days specified.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENT_FV_NO_ACTIVE_VERIFICATION_UTILIZATION
message.locale: There are no verification item utilizations to satisfy this verification requirement.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENT_XRV_NO_VERIFIABLE_ID
message.locale: There are no verifiable data item for this verification requirement.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENT_XRV_HAS_ASSOCIATED_VERIFICATION_REQUIREMENT
message.locale: The verification requirement cannot be deleted until all associated verification requirements have been removed.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENT_XRV_HAS_ASSOCIATED_USAGE_VERIFICATION_APPLICATION
message.locale: The verification requirement cannot be deleted as it has been used in the application.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENT_FV_DUE_DAYS_WITHOUT_DUEDATEFROM
message.locale: Due Days cannot be specified if there is no Due Date From specified.
